calculatePrice(uint256).details: get the latest price for the market's quote token in USD                          (`priceConsumerPrice`, with decimals `priceConsumerDecimals`)                          then `scalePrice` to scale the fixed bond price to THEO decimals when calculating `price`.                          finally, calculate `price` as quote tokens per THEO, in THEO decimals (9)

returns._0: uint256 price of THEO in quote token terms, in THEO decimals (9)

create(address,address,uint256[2],bool[2.details: current price should be in 9 decimals.

params._market: [capacity (in THEO or quote), fixed bond price (9 decimals) USD per THEO]
params._priceFeed: address of the price consumer, to return the USD value for the quote token when deposits are made
params._terms: [vesting length (if fixed term) or vested timestamp, conclusion timestamp]

params._amount: the amount of quote token to spend
params._maxPrice: the maximum price at which to buy

params._user: the user to query notes for

returns._0: the pending notes for the user

payoutFor(uint256,uint256).details: 1e18 = theo decimals (9) + fixed bond price decimals (9)

params._amount: amount of quote tokens to spend

returns._0: amount of THEO to be paid in THEO decimals

params._index: the index of the note in the user's array
params._user: the user that the note belongs to

returns.created_: the time the note was created
returns.expiry_: the time the note is redeemable
returns.matured_: if the payout can be redeemed
returns.timeRemaining_: the time remaining until the note is matured

params._from: the address that approved the note transfer
params._index: the index of the note to transfer (in the sender's array)
index of note to approve transfer for
params._to: address to approve note transfer for

redeem(address,uint256[]).details: adapted from Olympus V2. Olympus V2 either sends payout as gOHM                     or calls an `unwrap` function on the staking contract                     to convert the payout from gOHM into sOHM and then send as sOHM.                     This current contract sends payout as sTHEO.

returns.payout_: sum of payout sent, in sTHEO

redeemAll(address).details: if possible, query indexesFor() off-chain and input in redeem() to save gas

params._user: user to redeem all notes for

returns._0: sum of payout sent, in sTHEO

calculatePrice(uint256).notice: calculate the price of THEO in quote token terms; i.e. the number of quote tokens per THEO

deposit(uint256,uint256,uint256,address,.notice: deposit quote tokens in exchange for a bond from a specified market

isLive(uint256).notice: is a given market accepting deposits

liveMarkets().notice: returns an array of all active market IDs

liveMarketsFor(address).notice: returns an array of all active market IDs for a given quote token

payoutFor(uint256,uint256).notice: payout due for amount of quote tokens

pendingFor(address,uint256).notice: calculate amount available for claim for a single note

pullNote(address,uint256).notice: transfer a note that has been approved by an address

pushNote(address,uint256).notice: approve an address to transfer a note

redeemAll(address).notice: redeem all redeemable markets for user

setRewards(uint256,uint256).notice: set rewards for front end operators and DAO

whitelist(address).notice: add or remove addresses from the reward whitelist
